titles.title: A bill for the relief of Olga Sellares Barney and her children Christian Sellares Barney, Kevin Sellares Barney, and Charles Sellares Barney.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/2/1987--Introduced. Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
